languages.text: "Каким глупцом нужно быть, чтобы добровольно превратиться в такое отродье".
"It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."
languages.original_text: "Каким глупцом нужно быть, чтобы добровольно превратиться в такое отродье".

traits.locale_text: "How stupid you must be to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."
"How stupid you must be to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."
"It takes a true pillock to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."
"It takes a true pillock to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."
"It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."
"It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."

languages.text: 「このような醜態をさらそうとは、本物の愚か者と言わざるを得ない」
languages.original_text: "It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."

traits.locale_text: 「このような醜態をさらそうとは、本物の愚か者と言わざるを得ない」

languages.text: “只有真正的白痴，才渴望变成这样的怪物。”
languages.original_text: "It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."

traits.locale_text: “只有真正的蠢货，才渴望变成这样的怪物。”

languages.text: «Hay que ser imbécil para pedir que le transformen en semejante abominación».
languages.original_text: "It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."

traits.locale_text: «Hay que ser imbécil para pedir que le transformen en semejante abominación».

languages.text: "Es ist schon ein wahrer Narr nötig, um darum zu bitten, in eine solche Abscheulichkeit verwandelt zu werden."
languages.original_text: "It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schon ein wahrer Schwachkopf nötig, um darum zu bitten, in eine solche Abscheulichkeit verwandelt zu werden."

languages.text: « Il faut quand même être sacrément débile pour demander à être transformé en une abomination pareille. »
languages.original_text: "It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."

traits.locale_text: « Il faut quand même être sacrément débile pour demander à être transformé en une abomination pareille. »

languages.text: "Böyle bir ucubeye dönüşmeyi istemek için gerçekten ahmak olmak gerek."
languages.original_text: "It takes a true fool to ask to be transformed into such an abomination."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi bir ucubeye dönüşmeyi istemek için gerçekten ahmak olmak gerek."
